verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to them that devise <S%H2803><s%> iniquity, <S%H205><s%> and work <S%H6466><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> their beds! <S%H4904><s%> when the morning <S%H1242><s%> is light, <S%H216><s%> they practice <S%H6213><s%> it, because <S%H3588><s%> it is <S%H3426><s%> in the power <S%H410><s%> of their hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And they covet <S%H2530><s%> fields, <S%H7704><s%> and take them by violence; <S%H1497><s%> and houses, <S%H1004><s%> and take them away: <S%H5375><s%> so they oppress <S%H6231><s%> a man <S%H1397><s%> and his house <S%H1004><s%> even a man <S%H376><s%> and his heritage. <S%H5159><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> family <S%H4940><s%> do I devise <S%H2803><s%> an evil, <S%H7451><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> remove <S%H4185><s%> your necks; <S%H6677><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall ye go <S%H1980><s%> haughtily: <S%H7317><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> this <S%H1931><s%> time <S%H6256><s%> is evil. <S%H7451><s%>

In that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall one take up <S%H5375><s%> a parable <S%H4912><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you, and lament <S%H5091><s%> with a doleful <S%H5093><s%> lamentation, <S%H5092><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> We be <S%H1961><s%> utterly spoiled: <S%H7703><s%> <S%H7703><s%> he hath changed <S%H4171><s%> the portion <S%H2506><s%> of my people: <S%H5971><s%> how <S%H349><s%> hath he removed <S%H4185><s%> it from me! turning away <S%H7728><s%> he hath divided <S%H2505><s%> our fields. <S%H7704><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thou shalt have <S%H1961><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> that shall cast <S%H7993><s%> a cord <S%H2256><s%> by lot <S%H1486><s%> in the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Prophesy <S%H5197><s%> ye not, <S%H408><s%> say they to them that prophesy: <S%H5197><s%> they shall not <S%H3808><s%> prophesy <S%H5197><s%> to them, <S%H428><s%> that they shall not <S%H3808><s%> take <S%H5253><s%> shame. <S%H3639><s%>

O thou that art named <S%H559><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> is the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> straitened? <S%H7114><s%> are these <S%H428><s%> his doings? <S%H4611><s%> do not <S%H3808><s%> my words <S%H1697><s%> do good <S%H3190><s%> to <S%H5973><s%> him that walketh <S%H1980><s%> uprightly? <S%H3477><s%>

Even of late <S%H865><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> is risen up <S%H6965><s%> as an enemy: <S%H341><s%> ye pull off <S%H6584><s%> the robe <S%H145><s%> with <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4136><s%> the garment <S%H8008><s%> from them that pass by <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5674><s%> securely <S%H983><s%> as men averse <S%H7725><s%> from war. <S%H4421><s%>

The women <S%H802><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%> have ye cast out <S%H1644><s%> from their pleasant <S%H8588><s%> houses; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> their children <S%H5768><s%> have ye taken away <S%H3947><s%> my glory <S%H1926><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>

Arise <S%H6965><s%> ye, and depart; <S%H1980><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> is not <S%H3808><s%> your rest: <S%H4496><s%> because <S%H5668><s%> it is polluted, <S%H2930><s%> it shall destroy <S%H2254><s%> you, even with a sore <S%H4834><s%> destruction. <S%H2256><s%>

If <S%H3863><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> walking <S%H1980><s%> in the spirit <S%H7307><s%> and falsehood <S%H8267><s%> do lie, <S%H3576><s%> saying, I will prophesy <S%H5197><s%> unto thee of wine <S%H3196><s%> and of strong drink; <S%H7941><s%> he shall even be <S%H1961><s%> the prophet <S%H5197><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> people. <S%H5971><s%>

I will surely assemble, <S%H622><s%> <S%H622><s%> O Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of thee; I will surely gather <S%H6908><s%> <S%H6908><s%> the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> I will put <S%H7760><s%> them together <S%H3162><s%> as the sheep <S%H6629><s%> of Bozrah, <S%H1223><s%> as the flock <S%H5739><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of their fold: <S%H1699><s%> they shall make great noise <S%H1949><s%> by reason of the multitude of men. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H120><s%>

The breaker <S%H6555><s%> is come up <S%H5927><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them: they have broken up, <S%H6555><s%> and have passed through <S%H5674><s%> the gate, <S%H8179><s%> and are gone out <S%H3318><s%> by it: and their king <S%H4428><s%> shall pass <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them, and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> on the head <S%H7218><s%> of them.
